Package twa.orthos.questsystembehavior.v1.container.quest

Class QuestsContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • twa.orthos.questsystembehavior.v1.container.quest.QuestsContainer
  • public class QuestsContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class to store created quests. The container has the purpose to synchronise the internal quest list with the quest name list on screen.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.util.List<Quest> questList

      Returns the singleton instance of the quest container.

      Returns the quest with the index.
      Quest getQuestByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the quest with the name from the internal list.
      java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> getQuestNames()
      Returns a vector of quest names as content for the quest list in the interface.
      void removeQuest​(int idx)
      Removes a quest from the internal list.
      void sort()
      Sorts the list of quests alphabetically from A to Z.
